snippet: Manny Ramirez, a 12-time All-Star, must serve a 50-game suspension if he makes the Athletics’ roster.
abstract: MLB Roundup; slugging outfielder Manny Ramirez, a 12-time All-Star, must serve a 50-game suspension if he makes the Oakland Athletics’ roster, as he tries to return to major league baseball a year after retiring rather than face doping suspension; other baseball items noted.
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramirez, a 12-time All-Star, must serve a 50-game suspension if he makes the Athletics’ roster.

headline.seo: Manny Ramirez Returns to Oakland’s Lineup
headline.main: Ramirez Returns to Oakland’s Lineup With Exuberance and as a Positive Example
headline.print_headline: Ramirez Returns to Oakland’s Lineup With Exuberance and as a Positive Example
